refnamediv.refpurpose: Allows a string to be linked with a numeric value.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Allows a string to be linked with a numeric value.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: strset (optional) allows a string, such as a filename, to be linked with a numeric value. Its use is optional.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
The following statement, used in the orchestra header, will allow the numeric value 10 to be substituted anywhere the soundfile asound.wav is called for.
strset 10, "asound.wav"

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
